faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about admission
faq.search: Enter keyword to search (e.g.: exam, certificate, cost)...
faq.noQuestionsInCategory: No questions in this category yet
faq.contactTitle: Didn't find an answer to your question?

general.a1: Document submission at Salymbekov HSM begins on July 1 and continues until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted both in person at the admissions office and online through our website.
general.q2: What educational programs does the HSM offer?
general.a2: Salymbekov HSM offers programs in: General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the KR.
general.q3: How long does the education last?
general.a3: The duration of education depends on the program: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.q4: In what languages is education conducted?
general.a4: Education is conducted in Russian and Kyrgyz languages. Students can choose their preferred language of instruction upon admission.
general.q5: Is there practice in foreign clinics?
general.a5: Yes, the HSM cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. The best students can do internships abroad.
general.q6: Is the diploma recognized outside Kyrgyzstan?
general.a6: Salymbekov HSM diploma is recognized in CIS countries. For work in other countries, additional certification may be required according to local legislation.

footer.aboutDescription: Salymbekov HSM is a leading medical educational institution in Kyrgyzstan, providing high-quality education and training future healthcare professionals.

general.exchangePrograms: Yes, the HSM participates in academic mobility programs with partner universities in Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkey and other countries.
general.militaryDeferment: Yes, full-time students receive deferment from military service for the entire study period according to the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic.

documents.required: Required documents: high school diploma, passport, medical certificate form 086U, ORT certificate, photos 3x4 (6 pcs), family composition certificate, income certificate (for benefits).
documents.nostrification: Yes, education documents obtained outside the Kyrgyz Republic are subject to mandatory nostrification in relevant state authorities.
documents.medicalValidity: Medical certificate form 086U is valid for 6 months from the date of issue. The certificate must contain all necessary medical examinations.
documents.onlineSubmission: Yes, you can apply online through our website. After application approval, you will need to provide original documents within 3 days.
documents.translation: Documents in Russian language do not require translation. Documents in other languages must be translated into Kyrgyz or Russian and notarized.
documents.lostDocuments: If documents are lost, they must be restored in the relevant authorities. For diploma contact your school, for passport - Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Kyrgyz Republic. The procedure may take up to 30 days.

exams.subjects: For medical specialties (General Medicine, Dentistry): biology and chemistry. For Pharmacy: chemistry and biology. For Nursing: only biology. ORT certificate is also required.
exams.dates: Entrance exams are held from August 20 to 25. The exact schedule is published on the HSM website and in the admission office by August 15.
exams.minimumScore: Minimum ORT scores: General Medicine - 120, Dentistry - 110, Pharmacy - 100, Nursing - 90 points. For profile subjects - minimum 60% correct answers.
exams.retake: Retaking entrance exams is possible only in the next academic year. Only one attempt is given in the current year.
exams.preparation: The HSM conducts preparatory courses from May to July. Also recommend using textbooks for grades 10-11 in biology and chemistry, ORT tests from previous years.
exams.format: Exams are conducted in test form. Each test contains 40 questions, time limit - 90 minutes. Forms for computer processing of results are used.
exams.benefits: Benefits are provided to orphans, disabled people of groups I-II, combat veterans. Winners of republican olympiads are enrolled without exams.

payment.cost: Tuition fees: General Medicine - 180,000 KGS/year, Dentistry - 200,000 KGS/year, Pharmacy - 160,000 KGS/year, Nursing - 140,000 KGS/year. Prices may change annually.
payment.discounts: Yes, discounts are provided: 15% for excellent students (GPA 4.5+), 10% for full year payment, 5% for large families, benefits for socially vulnerable categories.
payment.installment: Yes, payment by semesters is possible (50% by September 1, 50% by February 1) or monthly (10 equal payments from September to June). Additional fee for installment - 5%.
payment.methods: Payment is possible by: bank transfer, online banking (Elsom, Balance.kg, MBank), cash at HSM cash desk, through payment terminals, bank card.
payment.included: The fee includes: lectures, practical classes, access to library, laboratory work, internet on campus. Additional payment for: textbooks, dormitory, meals.

hostel.availability: Yes, the HSM provides a modern dormitory for 200 places. Placement is by application in order of priority. Priority is given to non-resident students and orphans.
hostel.cost: The cost of accommodation is 3000 KGS per month per place in a room for 2-3 people. The price includes: utilities, internet, cleaning of common areas.
hostel.conditions: The dormitory is equipped with: furniture, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchens on each floor, study rooms, Wi-Fi, video surveillance system, 24/7 security.
hostel.application: The application is submitted simultaneously with admission documents. You need to fill out a questionnaire, provide family income certificates, medical certificate, registration documents.

visa.content: List of required documents: passport, HSM invitation, financial guarantees, medical certificate, photos, completed application form.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.content: We provide comfortable dormitories with various accommodation options. Cost: from 1500 to 3500 rubles/month depending on conditions.

adaptation.title: Adaptation
adaptation.content: Each student is assigned a curator. Regular excursions, intercultural events and language clubs are held.

insurance.title: Medical Insurance
insurance.content: Mandatory medical insurance for the entire period of study. Cost: about 5000 rubles/year. Covers basic medical services.

pps.title: Faculty of the Higher School of Management
pps.mission_text: To train competitive specialists in the field of management, economics, and business administration, capable of effective decision-making in a dynamic global environment.
pps.faculty_text: The Faculty of the Higher School of Management offers bachelor's and master's programs in management, economics, and business administration. Our curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills, preparing students for successful careers in various industries.
pps.professor_list: Doctors of Medical Sciences from the teaching staff: Abdyldaev Rysbek Aldagandaevich - professor, oncologist, vice-president for advanced research, Tulekeyev Toktogazy Moldalievich - professor, surgeon, anatomist, vice-rector for research, Uzakbaev Kamchybek Askarbekovich - professor, pediatric surgeon, head of the science department, Imankulova Asel Sansyzbaevna - surgeon, vice-rector for postgraduate education, Atykanov Arystanbek Orozalievich - obstetrician-gynecologist, head of the MFD department, etc.
